name: Friends Electric
tag_list: cloud-marketing, crowdsourcing, social-media, seo, marketing, social-network, advertising, web-marketing, epr
overview:
Friends Electric is a Cloud Marketing Platform that combines a professional social network with a set of online marketing tools that enable advertising agencies, PR agencies and brand owners to deliver Social Media and SEO campaigns.

Friends Electric solves many of the problems that have been associated with Social Media and SEO campaigns in the past:

â€¢ Locating the best possible people to create and distribute compelling campaign content and engage with online audiences â€¢ Finding the right tools to intelligently plan activities associated with content campaigns such as link building, SEO and social networking â€¢ Creating consolidated campaign reports based on data and analytics from multiple sources â€¢ Controlling costs for both resources and tools which in turn allow for improved campaign returns â€¢ Providing clients real-time views of campaign resources and performance â€¢ Getting access to content evaluation services (such as Focus Groups) and Referral Networks (publisher networks) â€¢ Providing a social campaign environment which adds transparency and improves communication between campaign owners and clients â€¢ Generating consolidated campaign analytics which communicate results and deliver insights which can improve future decision-making

Agencies can also register their own resources as ‘Friends’ who then become available to work on 3rd party campaigns. This helps agencies to maximise their full time resources and creates a unique sales channel.

Our Social Network Members of the Friends Electric social network (aka ‘Friends’) form an online community of Content Creators, SEO Professionals and Engagement Marketers who can create profiles, get matched to campaign briefs and form relationships with other members in order to respond to more ambitious campaign briefs. The social network includes ranking and peer review features to help ensure quality and provide opportunities for advancement.

Release 1.0 of the Friends Electric website will begin for UK Beta Trials in October, 2010.
